nodes.description: 1992年7月阿根廷以色列大使馆遭汽车炸弹袭击，造成29人死亡
nodes.support_text: The 1992 bombing of the Israeli embassy in Buenos Aires, which killed 29 people, also remains unsolved.

nodes.description: 1994年7月18日阿根廷犹太社区中心AMIA遭大规模爆炸袭击，85人死亡300人受伤
nodes.support_text: The blast, on 18 July 1994, reduced the seven-storey Jewish-Argentine Mutual Association (AMIA) community centre to rubble.

nodes.description: 阿根廷检方指控前伊朗总统拉夫桑贾尼等8人策划并指使黎巴嫩真主党实施AMIA袭击
nodes.support_text: Argentine prosecutors are calling for the arrest of former Iranian President Hashemi Rafsanjani and seven others.

nodes.description: 伊朗外交部将指控定性为'犹太复国主义阴谋'，同时否认参与并指责以色列在巴勒斯坦犯下暴行
nodes.support_text: The Iranian foreign ministry described the move as 'a Zionist plot'.

nodes.description: 真主党与伊朗均否认涉事，称1994年袭击系伊朗情报机构策划的恐怖行动
nodes.support_text: Hezbollah and Iran both deny that they were involved in the blast.

nodes.description: 阿根廷警方曾查获用于袭击的改装卡车，但相关嫌疑人未被定罪
nodes.support_text: Minor figures have been named, including a policeman who sold the van used in the attack, but no-one has been convicted.

nodes.description: 2023年11月阿根廷检方披露FBI与阿根廷情报合作，指认已故黎巴嫩真主党成员伊布拉希姆·赫苏恩·伯罗为袭击策划者
nodes.support_text: Last November, an Argentine prosecutor said a member of Hezbollah was behind the attack and had been identified in a joint operation by Argentine intelligence and the FBI.

nodes.description: 真主党回应称伯罗早在1993年已死于与以色列的战斗，质疑阿根廷指控可信度
nodes.support_text: Hezbollah said that the man, Ibrahim Hussein Berro, had died in southern Lebanon while fighting Israel.

nodes.description: Hoseyni发表声明指责犹太复国主义
nodes.support_text: Hoseyni发表声明指责犹太复国主义

nodes.description: 指控转移国际关注以掩盖罪行
nodes.support_text: 指控转移国际关注以掩盖罪行

Hezbollah and Iran both deny that they were involved in the blast.

Last November, an Argentine prosecutor said a member of Hezbollah was behind the attack...
Hoseyni在电台发表讲话后引发国际关注
Hoseyni声明后伊朗外交部定性指控
指控转移国际关注后真主党否认
案件被传闻标记后引发后续指控
